node.statement: (Passage to the limit) Since mu_eps -> mu weakly as eps -> 0 (by the construction of the Phi^4_3 measure) and {R_eps} is uniformly integrable, the sequence R_eps converges in L^1(mu) to a limit R. The limit satisfies E_mu[R] = lim E_{mu_eps}[R_eps] = 1. For any bounded continuous test functional F: E_{T_psi* mu}[F] = lim E_{T_psi* mu_eps}[F] = lim E_{mu_eps}[F R_eps] = E_mu[F R], confirming that T_psi* mu has density R w.r.t. mu.
